Text: Latest ever release for the Rush 24/7 podcast I have ever experienced.

@Annoyme -


Shouldn't it be "Podcast on loan from Gawwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwd-AH!"?

Gotta get that "preacher-voice" in there!!

:)

First of all - thank you for today's podcast! :)

To tell you the truth, I honestly get really nervous when Rush says G_d's name like that. because we're not supposed to take G_d's name in vain like that.

Yes, Rush does have talent - no disputing that, but still... I wish he didn't do that. 

(That's just my two cents btw, not meant to provoke an arguement!)
